segments.text: This is infuriating to watch in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and that woman just keeps drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious to the mess spreading all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water rushing out?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids are raiding the cookie jar like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that rickety stool is asking for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's dangerous, and she's not even turning around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is helping him, reaching up without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They know they're not supposed to take cookies without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside it's a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stop this before something breaks or someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe adults can be so unaware sometimes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn around, lady, before the whole kitchen floods!
segments.speaker: PAR
